function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Asymptomatic testing in settings with low to moderate SARS-CoV-2 transmission rates did little to stop outbreaks.","Impact":"Potential for uncontrolled outbreaks in settings with low to moderate transmission rates.","Mitigation":"Increased frequency of testing or combination with high-quality infection control practices.","Technologies":"SARS-CoV-2 testing technologies.","People":"People in settings with low to moderate transmission rates.","Owner":"Healthcare administrators, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Testing alone was not enough to reduce R0 below 1 but effectively reduced transmission when paired with high-quality infection control practices.","Impact":"Inability to reduce R0 below 1 solely through testing.","Mitigation":"Combination of testing with high-quality infection control practices.","Technologies":"Testing technologies, infection control technologies.","People":"General population, healthcare workers.","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare administrators."},{"Description":"The effectiveness of test and trace depends strongly on coverage and the timeliness of contact tracing.","Impact":"Ineffective contact tracing can lead to uncontrolled spread of SARS-CoV-2.","Mitigation":"Improving coverage and timeliness of contact tracing.","Technologies":"Contact tracing technologies, data management tools.","People":"Individuals who require contact tracing.","Owner":"Public health authorities, contact tracing organizations."}]}
